column4: Hi! I've backed up Thunderbird Profiles directory at Windows system and now I need to import it to Thunderbird under Xubuntu. Can anyone help me with this?
Hi! I've backed up Thunderbird Profiles directory at Windows system and now I need to import it to Thunderbird under Xubuntu. Can anyone help me with this?
make a folder, copy your backup, press alt-f2 write thunderbird -profilemanager and point to the folder
